dataList.dlg: Hm… You can place new assignments on the left— Ah, you called for me.
…Is it… morning? C’est étrange. I do not remember clocking out.
Allow me… to nap for a moment. You can… have your lunch first…
My evenings are mostly occupied with outdoor assignments. Ah, I had my rest earlier today, so it’s fine.
I have taken care of the task you told me. I currently have assignments from four people, so if you have another request to make… It will have to wait until I’m done with these.
It has… been quite some time since I clocked out last. However, I cannot leave while the work I’ve been entrusted with isn’t done.
You’re… curious about this drink, I see. No, it’s not my preference. It simply is the only method I have to relieve exhaustion quickly.

You’ll… do some of my work for me?
I do not understand. These assignments are my responsibility. There is no need to share my burden.
The workload wasn’t always this heavy. When others left their work to me, I simply proved capable of handling it.

……
(He’s snoring softly)
Hm. You’re giving me a raise. Entendu. Pardon me then, as I have tasks to take care of…
I see you need me.
Engaging in external assignment.
I presume you have a request.
Entendu, will do.
The assignment is steadily approaching completion.
Gasp.
One has been taken care of.
Ah… Allow me… to rest for a moment…
It appears I… will be able to leave work on time.
That has confirmed that I… will have overtime.
Assignment complete. I’ll be returning to the office.
Assignment complete. …You mean that I can go home today. Entendu. Ouf…
Things… have gotten complicated.
